Details
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BookService } from '../../Services/BookService'; import { Book } from '../../Models/Book'; @Component({ selector: 'app-book-index', templateUrl: './book-index.component.html', styleUrls: ['./book-index.component.css'] }) export class BookIndexComponent { books!: Book[] constructor(private bookService: BookService) { } ngOnInit() { this.bookService.getBooks().subscribe(t => { this.books = t; }) } }
